org.echo.mobile.framework.support

Class ByteSerializerKt

  • org.echo.mobile.framework.support.ByteSerializerKt

  • public class ByteSerializerKt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] serialize(java.lang.String $receiver)
      Serializes String value to byte array. Concatenates length of string in bytes and string bytes.
      static byte[] serialize(boolean $receiver)
      Serializes Boolean value to byte array by serialization type. If value is true byte is 1 else 0.
      static <T> byte[] serialize(T[] $receiver, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,kotlin.Array[]> toBytes)
      Serializes typed Array to byte array by serialization function. Concatenates size of array and byte array from serializing function.
      static <T> byte[] serialize(java.util.Set<? extends T> $receiver, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,kotlin.Array[]> toBytes)
      Serializes typed Set to byte array by serialization function. Concatenates size of set and byte array from serializing function.
      static <K,V> byte[] serialize(java.util.Map<K,? extends V> $receiver, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super K,kotlin.Array[]> keyToBytes, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super V,kotlin.Array[]> valueToBytes)
      Serializes typed Map to byte array by serialization functions. Concatenates size of map and byte arrays from serializing functions.

      • serialize

                                     kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super K,kotlin.Array[]> keyToBytes,

        Serializes typed Map to byte array by serialization functions. Concatenates size of map and byte arrays from serializing functions.

        Parameters:
        keyToBytes - Function to serialize key item of map
        valueToBytes - Function to serialize value item of map
